subs.text:
@NassarMehmood @teamVRY I have an OG iPhone SE, a delight to hold. Recently had Apple replace battery, all in, about $70, a bargain! 

A friend has iPhone 13 Mini, it's sweet but big. My dream: OG SE as large a display as fits, w/skinny bezels & a bit thicker for more battery capacity, + current camera.
subs.rawText:
@NassarMehmood @teamVRY I have an OG iPhone SE, a delight to hold. Recently had Apple replace battery, all in, about $70, a bargain! 

A friend has iPhone 13 Mini, it's sweet but big. My dream: OG SE as large a display as fits, w/skinny bezels & a bit thicker for more battery capacity, + current camera.

subs.text: @_pjfinn Do you sometimes allow your iPhone to present a color image? (smile) Or is the desert so harsh that only b&w does it justice? Be aware, I shot thousands of b&w back in my film days. Mainly 35mm but some 120 and plenty of 4x5. Those were the days.
subs.rawText: @_pjfinn Do you sometimes allow your iPhone to present a color image? (smile) Or is the desert so harsh that only b&w does it justice? Be aware, I shot thousands of b&w back in my film days. Mainly 35mm but some 120 and plenty of 4x5. Those were the days.

subs.text:
Dear Tim Apple: I subscribe to Apple News+ and appreciate the quality content. I use two phones: the classic OG iPhone SE and a Google Pixel 6.

 Why can't I read Apple News+ on my Android phone?
subs.rawText:
Dear Tim Apple: I subscribe to Apple News+ and appreciate the quality content. I use two phones: the classic OG iPhone SE and a Google Pixel 6.

subs.text: I stumbled across the menu item to display my Twitter analytics. If you understand this data (I am foggy...) a question: is there some way to learn which tweets triggered  unusually high number of people to unfollow?
subs.rawText: I stumbled across the menu item to display my Twitter analytics. If you understand this data (I am foggy...) a question: is there some way to learn which tweets triggered  unusually high number of people to unfollow?

subs.text: @teamVRY My Pixel 6 battery is meh. I thought Android 13 might improve the battery . Maybe I need to do a hard reset and add one app at a time? I wonder if the Island app may be one culprit? I use it to enable using two accounts with the Wyze camera app.
subs.rawText: @teamVRY My Pixel 6 battery is meh. I thought Android 13 might improve the battery . Maybe I need to do a hard reset and add one app at a time? I wonder if the Island app may be one culprit? I use it to enable using two accounts with the Wyze camera app.

subs.text:
I drew a smaller circle atop a larger circle with two short lines as feet. VERY abstract. 

Text prompt: "owl in tree"

In less than a minute very attractive, artistic mages emerged.

Try it. 

May you live in interesting times.
subs.rawText:

subs.text:
# sound bar Q 
Recently bought a mid-range Samsung 65 inch TV with decent image quality but meh sound quality. Prices for sound bars seem out of line with the cost of the TV.

Which sound bar might make sense? This doesn't seem like rocket science.

subs.text: at time approx 22.5 "Let's destroy PowerPoint." Quote from Emad Mostaque, founder of [link] which released Stable Diffusion OPEN SOURCE model that runs using rather modest compute/GPU/memory resources https://t.co/QKsPkOyP61 #AI-viz
subs.rawText:
at time approx 22.5 "Let's destroy PowerPoint." 

Quote from Emad Mostaque, founder of https://t.co/zzgSjZvsbT which released Stable Diffusion OPEN SOURCE model that runs using rather modest compute/GPU/memory resources
https://t.co/QKsPkOyP61

#AI-viz

subs.text:
Interview with Emad Mostaque, founder of Stability AI. Image creation using AI e.g. DALLE2 or the far more efficient Stable Diffusion code (it's open source...) is producing exciting creative results. 

Well worth 25 minutes of your time. We do live in exciting times. 

#Ai-viz
subs.rawText:
Interview with Emad Mostaque, founder of Stability AI. Image creation using AI e.g. DALLE2 or the far more efficient Stable Diffusion code (it's open source...) is producing exciting creative results. 

Well worth 25 minutes of your time. We do live in exciting times. 

#Ai-viz

subs.text: August 10

I've subscribed to Apple News+ even though my daily driver is a Pixel 6. I consume via OG iPhone SE. Not ideal, but ok. If I don't get at least $10/month of value I'll cancel. My attraction: access to articles from several magazines that are otherwise behind paywalls. #applenews
